_header: Mary mild hath born a child / christ lieth in cradle bound
_description: A carol of the Feasts following Christmas — in quatrains (abcb), and burden: ‘Now this yol &c.’

CamGon383.First Lines:
Mari milde haþ boren a chyldecrist lyþ in cradul
                    bonde…
CamGon383.Last Lines: …[ ]his blod gan bledetak hit in ny[ ]…
CamGon383.Note:
Stanzas 1-6; ends imperfectly due to wear and loss of the corner of the
                    leaf.
CamGon383.Editions:
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 320-1; 1977, 292.
